resources.string: Hello, my name is Josh Gearou. I am a recent graduate of Pomona College working for a large company called Verizon Media Group. I am an associate software developer for the company. Some of my hobbies include: playing tennis, guitar, saxophone piano, singing, and coding of course. I also really enjoy reading fantasy books. my favorite fantasy author currently is Brandon Sanderson. I also enjoy listening to music. My favorite singer is Tori Kelly. \n\t\t\t\tMy next endeavor has been writing music. In my last semester of college, I took a course called Music Theory I. I learned a lot about writing music in the course and had a lot of fun doing it along the way. Since then, I have continued to compose and practice composing in my spare time. I couple this with online tutorials about music theory as well.
